about_the_game:
Welcome To Simple Clicker !

Description

You click to obtain resources that can be further used in crafting material that is worth more than the sum of its part. You could also sell the raw material for a quick buck. You'll start off with the Wood Clicker but as you earn coins, you'll be given the opportunity to unlock other clickers which give you the ability to obtain a new resource and open the crafting options

Upgrades

each resource clicker has its own upgrade panel. 

  • Yield upgrade - increase the number of units you receive from the respective clickers

  • Production upgrade - increase the rate at which the raw materials are yielded

  • Quality Upgrade - Increase the value of the produced material at the cost of production time.

Crafting

  • Use the acquired raw materials to create goods that can be sold for more than the raw materials in exchange for some additional production time.
